pledge_des: After pledging, you will receive an email that tells you how to donate the trees pledged.
noPledges: It seems no trees have been pledged yet. Please make a pledge and come back later to check the biggest pledges.
pledgeToPlantDesc: A tree costs {{treeCost}} {{currency}} and are planted in {{projectName}}. You will receive an email with a link to fulfill your pledge.
pledgeAddedMessage: Youâ€™ve pledged to plant {{treeCount}} Trees. You can tap continue to fulfill your pledge right now.
increasePledgeMessage: To increase your pledge, please enter an amount higher than {{treeCount}} trees. A tree costs {{treeCost}} {{currency}} and are planted in {{projectName}}
createPledgeFormHint: Hide my Name from the list (Anonymous Pledge)
higherTreeCount: Please enter a number higher than {{treeCount}}
